Are you always adding items to your Amazon cart but forgetting about them when you switch tabs or close the browser? With Buy or Bye, you'll never leave items behind again!

This lightweight extension is perfect for Amazon shoppers who want a reminder about the items still sitting in their cart. Whether you're switching tabs or closing the Amazon page, Buy or Bye will notify you with a clear, customizable alert. You can choose to be notified either when you leave the cart page specifically or any Amazon page in general.
